records.name: Bacon Organization
records.description: Bacon ipsum dolor sit amet pork chop venison chicken, chuck pork loin ham swine. Prosciutto pork rump salami ribeye. Flank pork chop porchetta sausage boudin, doner shankle pig salami kielbasa. Pork jerky meatball ham capicola meatloaf beef pig kielbasa ball tip pancetta pastrami. Corned beef beef ribs leberkas shankle venison jerky jowl short ribs shank brisket ground round cow. Pastrami shankle ball tip ham hock capicola landjaeger kielbasa. Beef ribs venison corned beef flank.
